title: How to Change the Default Web Browser App on Your iPhone to Open Links in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and More
description: Safari is an excellent app for all your web browsing needs, but Apple gives you the freedom to choose a different default web browser on your iPhone to open links in. If you primarily use a third-party web browser like Chrome or Firefox on your computer or tablet, changing your default iOS web browser allows you to have a synced web browsing experience across all your devices. Whether you're a fan of Chrome's seamless sync with your Google account, Firefox's privacy features, or another browser's unique tools, you can set it as your default for all hyperlinks across your iPhone. Recent... more

title: Use Apple Intelligence's Image Playground to Craft Custom Drawings and Animations for Almost Anything You Can Think Of
description: Growing up, I was told that hard work could get me anything I wanted. But with Apple's Image Playground, I can create almost any illustration or drawing imaginable just by typing or selecting a suggestion. This groundbreaking feature in Apple Intelligence lets you generate images from simple prompts, opening up exciting possibilities for creativity. Image Playground is part of a suite of image-creation tools in Apple Intelligence, currently available to developers in the iOS 18.2 beta and iPadOS 18.2 beta. Alongside it are two other tools: Genmoji, which creates emoji-style images for sharing... more

title: An IKEA Hack That Works Wonders For This Often-Ignored Nook
description: The area behind the door is frequently overlooked, often turning into a cluttered mess of hanging coats and bags. However, @corinas.leben found a way to change that. She took four basic IKEA FLISAT wall storage shelves, originally designed for organizing toys and books, and transformed them into a practical, behind-the-door storage system. By assembling the four shelves and attaching them to two vertical planks, she created a slim shelving unit that can be discreetly tucked away behind a door. title: The $20 IKEA Bedside Table That Became a Luxury Sideboard
description: My search for the perfect sideboard has been going on for like ever.
